name: Skill Submission
about: Submit a new skill to the catalog
labels: skill-submission
---

## Skill Name

<!-- e.g. my-awesome-skill -->

## Description

A brief description of what this skill teaches an agent to do.

## Submission Checklist

Before submitting, confirm the following:

- [ ] `manifest.yaml` is present and valid (name, version, description, author, entry)
- [ ] Skill passes the linter (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Archive is in the correct location (`archives/<name>-<version>.tar.gz`)
- [ ] `README.md` is included in the archive
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, credentials, personal info) included
- [ ] Skill does not duplicate an existing catalog entry
- [ ] Author contact information is accurate in the manifest

## Testing

Describe how you tested the skill and any edge cases you verified.

## Additional Notes

Any other context about this submission.
